title: Megane no Megami
description:
1-6. Megane no Megami
Hiro has a glasses fetish and often brings his girlfriend home to have sex when his parents are out. His older sister (who also wears glasses) is usually home to hear this. One night Hiro walks in on his sister masturbating. She gets pissed and as punishment makes Hiro masturbate in front of her. Things start to develop from there...

7. Ano Natsu, Omoide no Umi (One Summer Dream)

8. Kanojo wa Sore o Yurusenai!? (Sweet Sweet Switch)

9. Boku no Haigorei? (The Ghost Behind My Back?)
P.S.: BE AWARE - 7 IS NTR!
